### High Mast Lights Replacement

* Publication date: August 19, 2022
* Closing date and time: September 8, 2022, 1:00 PM EST
* Amendment date: September 7, 2022
* Tender status: Expired

**Supply Information**
### High Mast Lights Replacement Services

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) Collins Bay Medium Institution in Ontario requests bids for the removal and installation of three (3) new high mast lights and associated systems. 

This contract aims to achieve the following objectives:
* Remove and dispose of three (3) existing high mast lighting standards
* Install two (2) new high mast lighting standards in the exercise yard and one (1) on the west side of the Programs Building
* All lighting must be energy-efficient luminaires

**Required Deliverables and Timing**

* The contractor must deliver all personnel, tools, services, supplies, materials, supervision, and equipment to complete the work within 12 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

**Evaluation Criteria and Application Information**

* Bidders can obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
